Quest

Class KillingQuest

  • java.lang.Object
    • Quest.Quest
      • Quest.KillingQuest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class KillingQuest
extends Quest
    This is a class that provides a quest to kill a certain character, specified in the constructor, x times. This class will only know what character to kill, leaving the rest up to its superclass, Quest.
    Author:
    Johan
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      void update(java.lang.String name, PlayerCharacter p)

        id - Quest ID
